Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: Emiliano Evans
Message:
feat(security): Complete FASE 3 - Security Deep Dive (P011-P014)

âœ… FASE 3: 100% COMPLETADA (4/4 prompts)

P011: Dependency Vulnerability Scan
- Script: vulnerability_scan.py (1,000 lines)
- Tests: test_dependency_security.py (14 tests)
- Features: pip-audit, safety, license validation
- Formats: JSON, HTML, Markdown

P012: Secret Scanning & Hardening
- Script: secret_scanner.py (850 lines)
- Tests: test_secret_scanning.py (19 tests)
- Tools: Gitleaks patterns, TruffleHog integration
- Hardening: File permissions, environment validation

P013: OWASP Top 10 2021 Validation
- Script: owasp_validator.py (1,000 lines)
- Tests: test_owasp_top10.py (30 tests)
- Coverage: All 10 OWASP categories, 77 CWE mappings
- Detection: Pattern-based + static analysis
- Baseline: 254 findings, 0/100 compliance score

P014: Compliance Report Generator
- Script: compliance_report.py (800 lines)
- Features: Unified findings consolidation
- Standards: OWASP, CWE, NIST SP 800-53, PCI-DSS
- Risk scoring: 0-100 weighted algorithm
- SLO tracking: 5 security objectives
- Roadmap: 4-phase remediation plan
- Baseline: 127 findings, CRITICAL risk level

Documentation (4 guides, 3,350 lines):
- P011-DEPENDENCY-SCAN-GUIDE.md
- P012-SECRET-SCANNING-GUIDE.md
- P013-OWASP-VALIDATION-GUIDE.md
- P014-COMPLIANCE-REPORT-GUIDE.md

Progress Reports:
- FASE3-PROGRESS-REPORT.md (100% complete)
- QA-MASTER-REPORT.md (70% global progress)

Makefile: 12 new security targets
- vuln-scan, secret-scan, owasp-scan
- compliance-report, compliance-show

CI/CD: Pre-deployment gates with exit codes
- 0: OK (deploy allowed)
- 1: HIGH risk (approval required)
- 2: CRITICAL risk (deployment BLOCKED)

Global Progress: 70% (14/20 prompts)
Next: FASE 4 - Performance & Observability

| `REDIS_PASSWORD` | 12 chars | No defaults | HIGH |
| `PMS_API_KEY` | 20 chars | VÃ¡lido | HIGH |

- `REPLACE_WITH_SECURE`, `CHANGEME`, `CHANGE_ME`

| Archivo | Permisos Requeridos | Riesgo si Incorrectos |

| `.env.production` | 0600 | Credenciales production |
